孻字的基本解释

孻
nái
方言，中国广东，福建一带称老年所生幼子为孻。

孻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［nái］
［《字彙補》泥台切］
(1)方言。老年所生幼子；最小的儿子、女儿。
(2)方言。末尾的。

孻字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【子字部】　孻； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页281第03
【字彙補】泥台切，奈平聲。【寂園雜記】廣東謂老人所生幼子曰孻。

孻字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
孻字的起名意思

方言。老年所生幼子；最小的儿子﹑女儿。

Ji
Basic explanation of words
Ji
nái
In the dialects of Guangdong and Fujian in China, the young children born in old age are called 孻.
Ji
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［nái］
["Zihuibu" mud table cut]
(1) Dialects. Youngest son and daughter born in old age.
(2) Dialects. At the end.
Ji
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【The first chapter of Yinji】【Sub-word department】　孻; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: Page 281 03
【Word Supplement】The mud table cuts, Naiping sounds. [Miscellaneous Records of Jiyuan Garden] Guangdong said that the young children born to the elderly are called children.
